üéØ Usage Instructions:

1. Load an input image
2. Set positive prompt (what you want)
3. Set negative prompt (what you don't want)
4. Adjust parameters:
   ‚Ä¢ Steps: 15-30
   ‚Ä¢ CFG: 6-8
   ‚Ä¢ Seed: random or fixed
5. Click Queue to generate

üí° Tips:
‚Ä¢ Use descriptive prompts
‚Ä¢ Start with default settings
‚Ä¢ Monitor VRAM usage

üîß Troubleshooting:

‚ùå Red nodes = Missing custom nodes
   ‚Üí Install via ComfyUI Manager

‚ùå Model errors = Wrong file paths
   ‚Üí Check model locations

‚ùå Memory errors = Too high settings
   ‚Üí Reduce batch size/steps

‚ùå Slow generation = Low VRAM
   ‚Üí Use GGUF versions

üîß Custom Node Installation:

In ComfyUI:
1. Click 'Manager' button
2. Go to 'Install Custom Nodes'
3. Search for each node:
   ‚Ä¢ ComfyUI-Lora-Manager
   ‚Ä¢ ComfyUI-wanBlockswap
   ‚Ä¢ ComfyUI-mxToolkit
   ‚Ä¢ ComfyUI-HunyuanVideoMultiLora
   ‚Ä¢ ComfyUI-Florence2
   ‚Ä¢ ComfyUI-Upscaler-Tensorrt
   ‚Ä¢ ComfyUI-MultiGPU
4. Install each one
5. Restart ComfyUI
